response.original_title: それいけ! アンパンマン ミージャと魔法のランプ
response.overview: Creampanda and Kokin-chan picked up a mysterious lamp. What emerged from the lamp was the spirit girl Mija. The three enter the world of lamps with her magic, but the magic bracelet breaks and they cannot return to their own world. Mija and his friends work together to aim for a magical fountain to fix the bracelet. Huge enemies such as the genie of sweets and the monster of "Scary Scary Forest" stand in front of them, but they manage to overcome them. Later, Anpanman and his friends jumped into the ramp and joined Mija and others, and arrived at the magical fountain, but if they aimed at the power of the fountain, Baikinman also came.
response.title: Go! Anpanman: Mija and The Lamp of Magic
